Articles.Content:
In an effort to improve the quality, reliability and security of KSP's Spaceport service, the server in which it is hosted will be shut down to undergo a maintenance session. Rest assured, final frontiersmen, that it will be brought back online and Spaceport made available to you as fast and safely as humanly possible.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Edited May 22, 2013 by Capt'n Skunky
